diff_hunk:
@@ -225,8 +226,14 @@ def ref_log_prob(idx, val, log_prob):
             self.assertEqual(log_prob, math.log(prob if val else 1 - prob))
 
         self._check_log_prob(Bernoulli(p), ref_log_prob)
+        self._check_log_prob(Bernoulli(logits=p.log() - (-p).log1p()), ref_log_prob)
body: Tensorflow uses `logits` informally throughout to refer to both log-odds and log-probs. In an effort to maximize compatibility with [tf.distributions.Categorical](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/distributions/Categorical), I recommend we name this parameter `logits`.
body_html: Tensorflow uses logits informally throughout to refer to both log-odds and log-probs. In an effort to maximize compatibility with tf.distributions.Categorical, I recommend we name this parameter logits.
body_text: Tensorflow uses logits informally throughout to refer to both log-odds and log-probs. In an effort to maximize compatibility with tf.distributions.Categorical, I recommend we name this parameter logits.
